channel.title: My SpawnPvP Server In Beta
channel.description: So i have my spawnpvp server in delta mode atm which means you can spawn anything until i release the eco pk version on june 3. But i'm getting reports about account's not being unable to access once they spawn a certain item and their screen freezes. Is their anyway to prevent my accounts from getting nulled? If so please help me. This is a Pi 317 server.

Thanks man, i’ll add when i get back home.
